svg.content: <mxfile host="Electron" agent="Mozilla/5.0 (Windows NT 10.0; Win64; x64) AppleWebKit/537.36 (KHTML, like Gecko) draw.io/24.7.17 Chrome/128.0.6613.36 Electron/32.0.1 Safari/537.36" version="24.7.17"> <diagram name="Seite-1" id="llUXhybjwgUDQI2FWRyA"> <mxGraphModel dx="1195" dy="797" grid="1" gridSize="10" guides="1" tooltips="1" connect="1" arrows="1" fold="1" page="1" pageScale="1" pageWidth="1169" pageHeight="827" math="0" shadow="0"> <root> <mxCell id="0" /> <mxCell id="1" parent="0" /> <mxCell id="16KsEQKx5cvaxfWI2I7S-68" value="... id="16KsEQKx5cvaxfWI2I7S-26" value="Root Dispersion<div>0,000061 s (61 us)</div>" style="rounded=1;whiteSpace=wrap;html=1;fillColor=#ffe6cc;strokeColor=#d79b00;" vertex="1" parent="1"> <mxGeometry id="16KsEQKx5cvaxfWI2I7S-31" value="PP<span style="background-color: initial;">I</span><div>6</div>" style="rounded=1;whiteSpace=wrap;html=1;fillColor=#d5e8d4;strokeColor=#82b366;" vertex="1" style="font-size: 20px;"><font style="font-size: 20px;"><br></font></b></div><span style="font-size: 20px;"><font style="font-size: 20px;"><i style="">chrony</i></font></span>" style="text;html=1;align=center;verticalAlign=middle;resizable=0;points=[];autosize=1;strokeColor=#82b366;fillColor=#d5e8d4;" vertex="1" parent="1"> <mxGeometry x="135" y="136" width="210" height="60" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="16KsEQKx5cvaxfWI2I7S-33" value="<div><b style="font-size: 20px;">NTP Server Response</b><b style="font-size: 20px;"><font style="font-size: 20px;"><br></font></b></div><span style="font-size: 20px;"><font style="font-size: 20px;"><i style="">time4.google.com</i></font></span>" style="text;html=1;align=center;verticalAlign=middle;resizable=0;points=[];autosize=1;strokeColor=#b85450;fillColor=#f8cecc;" vertex="1" parent="1"> <mxGeometry x="805" y="136" width="230" height="60" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="16KsEQKx5cvaxfWI2I7S-34" value="" style="endArrow=none;dashed=1;html=1;rounded=0;entryX=1;entryY=1;entryDx=0;entryDy=0;exitX=1;exitY=0;exitDx=0;exitDy=0;" edge="1" parent="1" source="16KsEQKx5cvaxfWI2I7S-14" target="16KsEQKx5cvaxfWI2I7S-3"> <mxGeometry width="50" height="50" relative="1" as="geometry"> <mxPoint x="520" y="631" as="sourcePoint" /> <mxPoint x="570" y="581" as="targetPoint" /> </mxGeometry> </mxCell> <mxCell id="16KsEQKx5cvaxfWI2I7S-36" value="" style="endArrow=none;dashed=1;html=1;rounded=0;entryX=0;entryY=1;entryDx=0;entryDy=0;exitX=0;exitY=0;exitDx=0;exitDy=0;" edge="1" parent="1" source="16KsEQKx5cvaxfWI2I7S-14" target="16KsEQKx5cvaxfWI2I7S-1"> <mxGeometry width="50" height="50" relative="1" as="geometry"> <mxPoint x="130" y="332" as="sourcePoint" /> <mxPoint x="410" y="283" as="targetPoint" /> </mxGeometry> </mxCell> <mxCell id="16KsEQKx5cvaxfWI2I7S-37" value="" style="endArrow=classic;startArrow=classic;html=1;rounded=0;dashed=1;dashPattern=8 8;" edge="1" parent="1"> <mxGeometry width="50" height="50" relative="1" as="geometry"> <mxPoint x="40" y="231" as="sourcePoint" /> <mxPoint x="360" y="231" as="targetPoint" /> </mxGeometry> </mxCell> <mxCell id="16KsEQKx5cvaxfWI2I7S-38" value="Flags: 8 bits" style="text;html=1;align=center;verticalAlign=middle;whiteSpace=wrap;rounded=0;" vertex="1" parent="1"> <mxGeometry x="160" y="202" width="80" height="30" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="16KsEQKx5cvaxfWI2I7S-39" value="" style="endArrow=classic;startArrow=classic;html=1;rounded=0;dashed=1;dashPattern=8 8;" edge="1" parent="1"> <mxGeometry width="50" height="50" relative="1" as="geometry"> <mxPoint x="80" y="590" as="sourcePoint" /> <mxPoint x="400" y="590" as="targetPoint" /> </mxGeometry> </mxCell> <mxCell id="16KsEQKx5cvaxfWI2I7S-40" value="64 bits" style="text;html=1;align=center;verticalAlign=middle;whiteSpace=wrap;rounded=0;" vertex="1" parent="1"> <mxGeometry x="200" y="590" width="80" height="30" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="16KsEQKx5cvaxfWI2I7S-41" value="Leap Ind.<div>0 (no)</div>" style="rounded=1;whiteSpace=wrap;html=1;fillColor=#ffcccc;strokeColor=#36393d;" vertex="1" parent="1"> <mxGeometry x="720" y="242" width="80" height="29" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="16KsEQKx5cvaxfWI2I7S-42" value="Version<div>4</div>" style="rounded=1;whiteSpace=wrap;html=1;fillColor=#e1d5e7;strokeColor=#9673a6;" vertex="1" parent="1"> <mxGeometry x="800" y="242" width="120" height="29" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="16KsEQKx5cvaxfWI2I7S-43" value="Mode<div>4 (server)</div>" style="rounded=1;whiteSpace=wrap;html=1;fillColor=#f8cecc;strokeColor=#b85450;" vertex="1" parent="1"> <mxGeometry x="920" y="242" width="120" height="29" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="16KsEQKx5cvaxfWI2I7S-44" value="" style="endArrow=none;dashed=1;html=1;rounded=0;entryX=1;entryY=1;entryDx=0;entryDy=0;exitX=1;exitY=0;exitDx=0;exitDy=0;" edge="1" parent="1" target="16KsEQKx5cvaxfWI2I7S-43"> <mxGeometry width="50" height="50" relative="1" as="geometry"> <mxPoint x="800" y="322" as="sourcePoint" /> <mxPoint x="1250" y="581" as="targetPoint" /> </mxGeometry> </mxCell> <mxCell id="16KsEQKx5cvaxfWI2I7S-45" value="" style="endArrow=none;dashed=1;html=1;rounded=0;entryX=0;entryY=1;entryDx=0;entryDy=0;exitX=0;exitY=0;exitDx=0;exitDy=0;" edge="1" parent="1" target="16KsEQKx5cvaxfWI2I7S-41"> <mxGeometry width="50" height="50" relative="1" as="geometry"> <mxPoint x="760" y="322" as="sourcePoint" /> <mxPoint x="1090" y="283" as="targetPoint" /> </mxGeometry> </mxCell> <mxCell id="16KsEQKx5cvaxfWI2I7S-46" value="" style="endArrow=classic;startArrow=classic;html=1;rounded=0;dashed=1;dashPattern=8 8;" edge="1" parent="1"> <mxGeometry width="50" height="50" relative="1" as="geometry"> <mxPoint x="720" y="231" as="sourcePoint" /> <mxPoint x="1040" y="231" as="targetPoint" /> </mxGeometry> </mxCell> <mxCell id="16KsEQKx5cvaxfWI2I7S-47" value="Flags: 8 bits" style="text;html=1;align=center;verticalAlign=middle;whiteSpace=wrap;rounded=0;" vertex="1" parent="1"> <mxGeometry x="840" y="202" width="80" height="30" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="16KsEQKx5cvaxfWI2I7S-48" value="" style="endArrow=classic;startArrow=classic;html=1;rounded=0;dashed=1;dashPattern=8 8;" edge="1" parent="1"> <mxGeometry width="50" height="50" relative="1" as="geometry"> <mxPoint x="760" y="590" as="sourcePoint" /> <mxPoint x="1080" y="590" as="targetPoint" /> </mxGeometry> </mxCell> <mxCell id="16KsEQKx5cvaxfWI2I7S-49" value="64 bits" style="text;html=1;align=center;verticalAlign=middle;whiteSpace=wrap;rounded=0;" vertex="1" parent="1"> <mxGeometry x="880" y="590" width="80" height="30" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="16KsEQKx5cvaxfWI2I7S-53" value="<div><b><br></b></div><div><b>Flags fields</b></div><div>Leap Indicator (LI):</div><div><span style="white-space: pre;">	</span><b>0: no leap second warning</b><br></div><div><span style="white-space: pre;">	</span>1:&nbsp;<span style="background-color: initial;">last minute of the day has 61 seconds</span><br></div><div><span style="background-color: initial;"><span style="white-space: pre;">	</span>2:&nbsp;</span><span style="background-color: initial;">last minute of the day has 59 seconds</span><span style="background-color: initial;"><br></span></div><div><span style="background-color: initial;"><span style="white-space: pre;">	</span>3:&nbsp;</span><span style="background-color: initial;">unknown (clock unsynchronized)</span><span style="background-color: initial;"><br></span></div><div>Version (VN):</div><div><span style="white-space: pre;">	</span><b>4: NTP version 4</b> (RFC 5905)<br></div><div>Mode:</div><div><span style="white-space: pre;">	</span>0:&nbsp;<span style="background-color: initial;">reserved</span></div><div><span style="background-color: initial;"><span style="white-space: pre;">	</span>1:&nbsp;</span><span style="background-color: initial;">symmetric active</span></div><div><span style="background-color: initial;"><span style="white-space: pre;">	</span>2:&nbsp;</span><span style="background-color: initial;">symmetric passive</span><span style="background-color: initial;">&nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp;</span></div><div><span style="white-space: pre;">	</span><b>3: client</b></div><div><b><span style="white-space: pre;">	</span>4: server</b><br></div><div><span style="white-space: pre;">	</span>5:&nbsp;<span style="background-color: initial;">broadcast</span></div><div><span style="background-color: initial;"><span style="white-space: pre;">	</span>6:&nbsp;</span><span style="background-color: initial;">NTP control message</span></div><div><span style="background-color: initial;"><span style="white-space: pre;">	</span>7:&nbsp;</span><span style="background-color: initial;">reserved</span></div><div><b><br></b></div><div><b>Peer fields</b></div>PCS: Peer Clock Stratum (of packet sender)<div><span style="white-space: pre;">	</span><b>0=unspecified, 1=primary reference</b>, ...<br></div><div>PPI: Peer Polling Interval (always from client)</div><div><span style="white-space: pre;">	</span><b>6: 64 seconds</b> (<span style="background-color: initial;">2^6 s</span><span style="background-color: initial;">)</span></div><div>PCP: Peer Clock Precision (of packet&nbsp;sender)</div><div><span style="white-space: pre;">	</span><b>32:&nbsp;</b><span style="background-color: initial;"><b>136 years</b> (</span><span style="background-color: initial;">2^32 s), <b>-20: 954 ns</b> (</span><span style="background-color: initial;">2^-20 s</span><span style="background-color: initial;">)</span></div><div><br></div><div><b>Root fields</b></div><div>Root Delay</div><div><span style="background-color: initial; white-space-collapse: preserve;">	</span><span style="background-color: initial;">Total round-trip delay to the (</span><span style="background-color: initial;">stratum 0)</span><span style="background-color: initial;">&nbsp;</span><span style="background-color: initial;">reference&nbsp;</span><span style="background-color: initial;">clock</span><br></div><div>Root Dispersion</div><div><span style="white-space: pre;"><span style="white-space: pre;">	</span></span><span style="background-color: initial;">Total dispersion to the (</span>stratum 0)&nbsp;<span style="background-color: initial;">reference clock</span></div><div><span style="background-color: initial; white-space-collapse: preserve;">	</span>(<span style="background-color: initial;">accumulated&nbsp;</span><span style="background-color: initial;">max. error inherent in the measurement)</span><br></div><div><br></div><div><b>Reference field</b></div><div>Reference ID</div><div><span style="white-space: pre;">	</span><span style="background-color: initial;">ID of the particular server</span></div><div><br></div><div><b>Timestamp fields</b></div><div>Reference Timestamp</div><div><span style="white-space: pre;">	</span>time the system time was&nbsp;<span style="background-color: initial;">last set/corrected</span><br></div><div>Origin Timestamp</div><div><span style="white-space: pre;">	</span>mirrored from client packet "Transmit Timestamp" field<br></div><div>Receive Timestamp</div><div><span style="white-space: pre;">	</span>time when packet was received<br></div><div>Transmit Timestamp</div><div><span style="white-space: pre;">	</span>time when packet was transmitted<br></div>" style="text;html=1;align=left;verticalAlign=middle;resizable=0;points=[];autosize=1;strokeColor=none;fillColor=none;" vertex="1" parent="1"> <mxGeometry x="420" y="100" width="340" height="690" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="16KsEQKx5cvaxfWI2I7S-54" value="<font style="font-size: 16px;">"Real World" Network Packet Content</font><div style="font-size: 16px;"><font style="font-size: 16px;">(client/server packets using well known UDP port 123)</font></div>" style="text;html=1;align=center;verticalAlign=middle;resizable=0;points=[];autosize=1;strokeColor=none;fillColor=none;" vertex="1" parent="1"> <mxGeometry x="380" y="67" width="410" height="50" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="16KsEQKx5cvaxfWI2I7S-56" value="<span style="font-size: 20px;"><b>NTPv4 Packets</b></span>" style="text;html=1;align=center;verticalAlign=middle;resizable=0;points=[];autosize=1;strokeColor=none;fillColor=none;" vertex="1" parent="1"> <mxGeometry x="500" y="30" width="170" height="40" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="16KsEQKx5cvaxfWI2I7S-57" value="<b>References:</b><div>https://datatracker.ietf.org/doc/html/rfc5905<br></div><div>https://www.iana.org/assignments/ntp-parameters/ntp-parameters.xhtml<br></div>" style="text;html=1;align=left;verticalAlign=middle;resizable=0;points=[];autosize=1;strokeColor=none;fillColor=none;" vertex="1" parent="1"> <mxGeometry x="30" y="730" width="400" height="60" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="16KsEQKx5cvaxfWI2I7S-58" value="The NTP client sends a single packet<div>to which the server responds&nbsp;<span style="background-color: initial;">with</span></div><div><span style="background-color: initial;">a single packet (with identical structure).</span></div>" style="ellipse;shape=cloud;whiteSpace=wrap;html=1;" vertex="1" parent="1"> <mxGeometry x="20" y="40" width="320" height="85" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="16KsEQKx5cvaxfWI2I7S-60" value="<div>Intentionally 0 or NULL</div><div>on client packets</div>" style="rounded=1;whiteSpace=wrap;html=1;fillColor=#eeeeee;strokeColor=#36393d;" vertex="1" parent="1"> <mxGeometry x="820" y="740" width="130" height="30" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="16KsEQKx5cvaxfWI2I7S-63" value="<div>From server</div>" style="rounded=1;whiteSpace=wrap;html=1;fillColor=#f8cecc;strokeColor=#b85450;" vertex="1" parent="1"> <mxGeometry x="950" y="710" width="130" height="30" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="16KsEQKx5cvaxfWI2I7S-64" value="<div>From client</div>" style="rounded=1;whiteSpace=wrap;html=1;fillColor=#d5e8d4;strokeColor=#82b366;" vertex="1" parent="1"> <mxGeometry x="820" y="710" width="130" height="30" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="16KsEQKx5cvaxfWI2I7S-65" value="<div>NTP version 4&nbsp;<span style="background-color: initial;">(RFC5905)</span></div>" style="rounded=1;whiteSpace=wrap;html=1;fillColor=#e1d5e7;strokeColor=#9673a6;" vertex="1" parent="1"> <mxGeometry x="820" y="680" width="260" height="30" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="16KsEQKx5cvaxfWI2I7S-66" value="<div>Accumulated from</div><div>root clock (stratum 0)</div>" style="rounded=1;whiteSpace=wrap;html=1;fillColor=#ffe6cc;strokeColor=#d79b00;" vertex="1" parent="1"> <mxGeometry x="950" y="740" width="130" height="30" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="16KsEQKx5cvaxfWI2I7S-69" value="<div><br></div><div>Packets can be&nbsp;<span style="background-color: initial;">optionally</span></div><div><span style="background-color: initial;">appended&nbsp;</span><span style="background-color: initial;">by extension fields</span></div><div><span style="background-color: initial;">(e.g. for authentication).</span></div><div><span style="background-color: initial;">See IANA reference for a list</span></div><div><span style="background-color: initial;">of more than 30!</span></div>" style="ellipse;shape=cloud;whiteSpace=wrap;html=1;" vertex="1" parent="1"> <mxGeometry x="50" y="600" width="205" height="130" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="16KsEQKx5cvaxfWI2I7S-70" value="Color Legend&nbsp;<span style="background-color: initial;">(origin of data):</span>" style="text;html=1;align=center;verticalAlign=middle;resizable=0;points=[];autosize=1;strokeColor=none;fillColor=none;" vertex="1" parent="1"> <mxGeometry x="810" y="650" width="180" height="30" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="16KsEQKx5cvaxfWI2I7S-72" value="(Optional Extension Fields ...)" style="rounded=1;whiteSpace=wrap;html=1;dashed=1;" vertex="1" parent="1"> <mxGeometry x="760" y="562" width="320" height="18" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="16KsEQKx5cvaxfWI2I7S-73" value="(Optional Extension Fields ...)" style="rounded=1;whiteSpace=wrap;html=1;dashed=1;" vertex="1" parent="1"> <mxGeometry x="80" y="562" width="320" height="18" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="16KsEQKx5cvaxfWI2I7S-74" value="No extension fields<div>were appended in this</div><div>chrony / google</div><div>setup</div>" style="ellipse;shape=cloud;whiteSpace=wrap;html=1;" vertex="1" parent="1"> <mxGeometry x="240" y="610" width="160" height="120" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> </root> </mxGraphModel> </diagram> </mxfile>

display: inline-block; font-size: 12px; font-family: Helvetica; color: rgb(0, 0, 0); line-height: 1.2; pointer-events: all; white-space: nowrap;

div.div:
Flags fields
Leap Indicator (LI):
0: no leap second warning
1: last minute of the day has 61 seconds
2: last minute of the day has 59 seconds
3: unknown (clock unsynchronized)
Version (VN):
4: NTP version 4 (RFC 5905)
Mode:
0: reserved
1: symmetric active
2: symmetric passive
3: client
4: server
5: broadcast
6: NTP control message
7: reserved
Peer fieldsPCS: Peer Clock Stratum (of packet sender)
0=unspecified, 1=primary reference, ...
PPI: Peer Polling Interval (always from client)
6: 64 seconds (2^6 s)
PCP: Peer Clock Precision (of packet sender)
32: 136 years (2^32 s), -20: 954 ns (2^-20 s)
Root fields
Root Delay
Total round-trip delay to the (stratum 0) reference clock
Root Dispersion
Total dispersion to the (stratum 0) reference clock
(accumulated max. error inherent in the measurement)
Reference field
Reference ID
ID of the particular server
Timestamp fields
Reference Timestamp
time the system time was last set/corrected
Origin Timestamp
mirrored from client packet "Transmit Timestamp" field
Receive Timestamp
time when packet was received
Transmit Timestamp
time when packet was transmitted

div.style: display: flex; align-items: unsafe center; justify-content: unsafe center; width: 1px; height: 1px; padding-top: 62px; margin-left: 565px;
box-sizing: border-box; font-size: 0px; text-align: center;
display: inline-block; font-size: 12px; font-family: Helvetica; color: rgb(0, 0, 0); line-height: 1.2; pointer-events: all; white-space: nowrap;
font-size: 16px;
div.font: (client/server packets using well known UDP port 123)

div.style: display: flex; align-items: unsafe center; justify-content: unsafe center; width: 1px; height: 1px; padding-top: 20px; margin-left: 565px;
box-sizing: border-box; font-size: 0px; text-align: center;

display: flex; align-items: unsafe center; justify-content: unsafe center; width: 318px; height: 1px; padding-top: 53px; margin-left: 1px;
box-sizing: border-box; font-size: 0px; text-align: center;
display: inline-block; font-size: 12px; font-family: Helvetica; color: rgb(0, 0, 0); line-height: 1.2; pointer-events: all; white-space: normal; overflow-wrap: normal;

div.div:
The NTP client sends a single packet
to which the server responds with
a single packet (with identical structure).

switch.text: The NTP client sends a single packet...

div.div:
No extension fields
were appended in this
chrony / google
setup

a.text: Text is not SVG - cannot display
